Job Description: Qualification:    Bachelor degree (minimum); Masters degree (preferred)      Experience Required:     1 to 6 years      Key Technical skills:    Java , Spring , NodeJS       Position Overview:       Currently looking for Developer with experience in developing Webservices / SOA / Java/ Mobility / Hybrid Mobile App Implementations.      2 years of experience coding in an Enterprise Java environment.        2 years of experience with Web Services, including SOAP and/or REST services using Spring, Hibernate, and/or Jersey frameworks.       2 years of experience with web application server configuration, including JBoss, Websphere, Tomcat, or Apache IIS.        3 years of experience with relational databases, including Oracle, Sybase, or SQLServer.        A solid grasp of OO principles and design patterns.        Banking / Health Care domain knowledge is added advantage.        Experience using testing strategies such as TDD, including knowledge of JUnit and Mockito.        Experience using continuous integration tools        Experience managing assignments effectively, multi-tasking, and working within tight deadlines.        Strong client-service orientation and experience working in a fast paced setting.
